title: All-Inclusive Adults-Only Caribbean Island Escape with Unlimited Drinks & Dining
description:
It’s all about luxury and hedonistic pampering with Instagram-worthy Caribbean views at Sonesta Ocean Point Resort. Hidden away on Sint Maarten island with direct access to Maho Beach and an enviable location right on the water, this five-star oasis is an adults-only nirvana.

Experience all-inclusive, limitless daily dining (breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks, afternoon tea and 24-hour room service) with unlimited premium beer, wine, spirits and cocktails across two exclusive à la carte restaurants, five bars and lounges - plus 12 additional outlets at the adjacent Sonesta Maho Beach Resort - a daily refreshed minibar, complimentary activities and entertainment, and so much more.
offer_address: 1A Rhine Road Maho Village, Sint Maarten
